item.title: 1 Month noise log | 28th June 2023 – 24th July 2023
item.dc:creator: no#15
item.description: Summery: Between the 18th June 2023 and the 24th July 2023 we produced a set of log’s detailing everything we...
item.content:encoded:
Summery:
Between the 18th June 2023 and the 24th July 2023 we produced a set of log’s detailing everything we could hear in detail for Richard of WDH.

Details:
For just short of a month we created details logs of everything we heard in that time, the information logged is arranged in an easy to understand way and scored between 1 and 10 on how bad the noise was, and what times.
We originally created these for Richard at WDH as he said written logs could help however he didn’t seem to be interested in them nor did he bring anything up regarding them.

Document : (Detailed logs given to Richard at WDH for the 28th June 2023 – 24th July 2023)

> Click Here to open the PDF in new tab.

item.title: Letter given to Richard at WDH | 23rd June 2023
item.dc:creator: no#15
item.description: Summery: on the 23rd June 2023,we gave a letter directly to Richard from WDH alongside our some log sheets he...
item.content:encoded:
Summery:
on the 23rd June 2023,we gave a letter directly to Richard from WDH alongside our some log sheets he had recommended we temporary do.
The letter details the concerns we had at the time and explained things upto that point, however nothing ever came of it.

Impact:
Letter was probably never even read.

Details:
We prepared a letter for Richard from WDH who we were working with at the time regarding our issue with number 14, we felt it easier to prepare it all in the letter than remembering everything on the spot whilst he was here, issues it’s caused us, tenant of number 14 threatening us at the door, potential risk of death from Lucy’s heart conditions, property we’ve had destroyed and several other things, however we never heard nothing back from it and just kept being asked the same generic questions over and over until our issue was closed without being resolved at all.
It detailed the noise we hear

Document : (Letter we gave to Richard at WDH)

> Click Here to open the PDF in new tab.

item.title: Noise log detailing everything – Log 8 | 3rd May 2023
item.dc:creator: no#15
item.description: Summery: on the 3rd May 2023, we produced a eighth noise log sheet detailing everything we could hear all day...
item.content:encoded:
Summery:
on the 3rd May 2023, we produced a eighth noise log sheet detailing everything we could hear all day and night as advised by Richard at WDH on the 15th.

Details:
we started a noise log sheet detailing everything we could hear all day and night as advised by Richard at WDH on the 15th.
We gave it just short of a week to see if the noise got any better before we started logging it as advised by Richard, but it didn’t get better and the warnings letters he sent out to number 14 were ignored again.

Document : (Log no#8 gave to Richard at WDH for the 1st May 2023)

> Click Here to open the PDF in new tab.
